title: Fashion Accessories - Since 1500 (History Arts).pdf
description:
Fashion Accessories Since 1500
Unwin Hyman | 1987 | ISBN: 0896760944 | English | 168 pages | PDF | 26.2 MB


Geoffrey Warren surveys the development of the accessory from 1500 to modern times, using a wide range of original sources. All the finishing touches of fashion - the gloves, hats, shoes, bags, canes - are drawn with a wealth of detail: not only individually, but also on figures to show how they were worn. The author describes the fabrics and colours used and discusses the origins and influences of the garments. Divided into easy-to-fmd chronological periods, the book also has a glossary and extensive bibliography
